data.name: FSM001Title
data.value: Menu state method signature

data.name: FSM001Description
data.value: Method '{0}' has incorrect signature for [Menu]. Expected: (a)sync (StateResult|Task<StateResult>) Method(SelectionStateContext [, CancellationToken]).

data.name: FSM002Title
data.value: Prompt state method signature

data.name: FSM002Description
data.value: Method '{0}' has incorrect signature for [Prompt<T>]. Expected: (a)sync (StateResult|Task<StateResult>) Method(PromptStateContext<T> [, CancellationToken]).

data.name: FSM003Title
data.value: Prompt state generic mismatch

data.name: FSM003Description
data.value: Generic argument of [Prompt<{0}>] does not match method parameter PromptStateContext<{1}>

data.name: FSM004Title
data.value: MenuItem or MenuRow without Menu/CustomState

data.name: FSM004Description
data.value: [MenuItem] or [MenuRow] used on method '{0}' without [Menu] or [CustomState]

data.name: FSM005Title
data.value: MenuItem or MenuRow label not found

data.name: FSM005Description
data.value: MenuItem or MenuRow label '{0}' is not a public static readonly ButtonLabel member of a class marked with [LabelStorage]

data.name: FSM006Title
data.value: Localization key not found

data.name: FSM006Description
data.value: Localization key '{0}' not found in project resources or string members

data.name: FSM007Title
data.value: Nullability mismatch

data.name: FSM007Description
data.value: Nullability mismatch between attribute generic argument and method parameter: '{0}' vs '{1}'

data.name: FSM008Title
data.value: Keyboard instruction without Menu/CustomState

data.name: FSM008Description
data.value: Keyboard instruction [{0}] is used on method {1} without [Menu] or [CustomState]

data.name: FSM009Title
data.value: ModelPrompt state method signature

data.name: FSM009Description
data.value: Method '{0}' has incorrect signature for [ModelPrompt<T>]. Expected: (a)sync (StateResult|Task<StateResult>) Method(ModelPromptContext<T> [, CancellationToken]).

data.name: FSM010Title
data.value: CustomState method signature

data.name: FSM010Description
data.value: Method '{0}' has incorrect signature for [CustomState]. Expected: (a)sync (StateResult|Task<StateResult>) Method(ModuleStateContext [, CancellationToken]).

data.name: FSM011Title
data.value: ModelPrompt state generic mismatch

data.name: FSM011Description
data.value: Generic argument of [ModelPrompt<{0}>] does not match method parameter ModelPromptContext<{1}>

data.name: FSM012Title
data.value: Missing resource files

data.name: FSM012Description
data.value: Consider adding resource files for localization to support keys like '{0}'

data.name: FSM013Title
data.value: Missing label storage

data.name: FSM013Description
data.value: Consider adding a class with [LabelStorage] attribute to define button labels

data.name: FSM014Title
data.value: Multiple state attributes

data.name: FSM014Description
data.value: Method '{0}' has multiple state attributes. Only one of [Menu], [Prompt<T>], [ModelPrompt<T>] or [CustomState] should be used

data.name: AnalyzerDescription
data.value: BotForge state attributes must be declared correctly

data.name: AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: State attribute usage requires correction

data.name: AnalyzerTitle
data.value: BotForge FSM Analyzer
